Texts.Eng:
A people of powerful faith and strongly attuned to the universe, Avians are naturals with staves and wands and are exceptionally agile.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Energy x^green;1.1^reset;, Damage x^green;1.05^reset;
  +^green;27^reset;% Jump Speed, +^green;5^reset;% Jump Height, Fall Damage x^green;0.35^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;15^reset;% Shadow, +^green;25^reset;% Electric, Cosmic
  Tech: ^green;Avian Slowfall^reset;

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  When airborne: Damage x^green;1.12^reset;
  Low to moderate wind: Air mobility
  Low wind: Health x^green;1.15^reset;, Defense x^green;1.1^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Wand/Staff: Damage x^green;1.2^reset;, +^green;15^reset;% Resist in equipped element
  Wand + Dagger: Can fire Cosmic Blasts (^green;Energy/16^reset; dmg)
  Short Spear: Damage x^green;1.06^reset;, +^green;1^reset;% Crit Chance
  Machine Pistol: +^green;1^reset;% Crit Chance

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Health x^red;0.85^reset;,
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;30^reset;% Ice, -^red;25^reset;% Poison, -^red;5^reset;% Physical
